pdb_title: Crystal structure of hla-a0201 in complex with an azobenzene- containing peptide

publication.abstract: Bioorthogonal cleavable linkers are attractive building blocks for compounds that can be manipulated to study biological and cellular processes. Sodium dithionite sensitive azobenzene-containing (Abc) peptides were applied for the temporary stabilization of recombinant MHC complexes, which can then be employed to generate libraries of MHC tetramers after exchange with a novel epitope. This technology represents an important tool for high-throughput studies of disease-specific T cell responses.

bibjson.title: Bioorthogonal cleavage and exchange of major histocompatibility complex ligands by employing azobenzene-containing peptides.

title: HLA-A*02:01 binding "GLSXXL" at 2.10Å resolution
